shows.title: Moonlight Benjamin
shows.desc: Orphaned at birth, Haitian Moonlight Benjamin was christened by the priest who took her in and raised her as his own. But her life and her music have seen her reconnect back to her voodoo folk roots and mash that together with a love of blues and jazz. The result is a music with mesmerising power and beauty. A shimmering, brooding rock n roll.
